GSD.description:
drm/gem: Fix GEM handle release errors

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.9 by commit b537612692f42fde7c9d227f9467f04f36178f2c. For more details please see the references link.
